mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_htdl_rslt(htdl_id, store_id, last_pnum, htdl_lmt_pnum, rsvd_rate, elap_tm) VALUES (#{htdlId}, #{storeId}, #{lastPnum}, #{htdlLmtPnum}, #{rsvdRate}, #{elapTm})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_htdl_rslt SET htdl_id = #{htdlId}, store_id = #{storeId}, last_pnum = #{lastPnum}, htdl_lmt_pnum = #{htdlLmtPnum}, rsvd_rate = #{rsvdRate}, elap_tm = #{elapTm} where htdl_id = #{htdlId}
